title: Single Image Upload with Valid Format and Preset Selection
description: Verify that a user can successfully upload a single valid dress image, select model presets and output package, submit the catalogue generation job, and receive a job ID.

steps.description: Navigate to Catalogue Generator page
Upload a single dress image in a supported format (e.g. JPEG, PNG)
Select model presets including body diversity and output types (stills, clips, runway videos)
Submit the catalogue generation job
Verify the system returns a valid job ID and job is queued

title: Batch Image Upload with Resumable Uploads
description: Verify that users can batch upload between 10 to 200 dress images with resumable upload support, and the system correctly queues processing jobs for each image.

steps.description: Navigate to Catalogue Generator page
Batch select and upload 50 dress images with mixed valid formats
Simulate a network interruption mid-upload and resume upload
Submit batch for processing
Verify all images were uploaded successfully and each image has a processing job queued

title: Upload Invalid File Format Rejection
description: Ensure the system rejects uploads with unsupported file formats and displays appropriate client-side validation messages.

steps.description: Navigate to Catalogue Generator page
Attempt to upload unsupported file formats (e.g. .exe, .txt)
Verify upload is blocked and user sees validation error messages

title: Catalogue Generation Job Status Tracking with Multiple Stages
description: Verify that users can monitor the progress of catalogue generation jobs showing detailed stages and ETA updates until completion.

steps.description: Submit a catalogue generation job
Poll job status endpoint at intervals to retrieve current stage and ETA
Verify stages include upload received, AI image generation, video generation, metadata processing, and completion
Verify ETA values update accurately until job completes

title: Generated Catalogue Assets Quality and Preset Compliance
description: Confirm that generated photorealistic images and videos meet the selected model presets regarding body diversity, gender mix, and style tags.

steps.description: Upload an image with specific model preset configurations (e.g. diverse body types, gender mix)
Complete catalogue generation job
Access generated stills, clips, and runway videos
Verify visual assets match the requested presets and style tags
Verify assets are photorealistic with no obvious AI artifacts

title: Preview Multi-Angle Playback with Metadata Badges
description: Verify the preview interface correctly displays multi-angle playback controls and metadata badges including market appeal, style compatibility, and body diversity indicators.

steps.description: Open preview page for a completed catalogue item
Verify playback control for multiple angles of the product clips and runway videos
Verify metadata badges show accurate values for market appeal, style compatibility, and body diversity

title: Bulk Export of Catalogue Package with Structured Metadata
description: Verify bulk export function downloads a ZIP file containing all generated images, videos, and metadata in CSV and JSON format matching catalogue content.

steps.description: Complete batch catalogue generation with multiple images
Trigger bulk export of catalogue package
Verify ZIP contains all expected media files
Verify CSV and JSON files include correct metadata for each asset

title: Trend Analyzer Filters and Dynamic Chart Visualizations
description: Verify the Trend Analyzer dashboard's demographic, seasonal, regional and category filters work correctly and the dynamic charts update with accurate predictive trend insights.

steps.description: Navigate to Trend Analyzer dashboard
Apply filters for season, age group, region, and dress category
Verify trend charts update to reflect selected filters
Verify predictive insights correspond logically with filtered data

title: Trend Watchlist Pinning and Alert Notification Setting
description: Verify users can pin selected trends to a watchlist and configure alert notifications which trigger on trend updates.

steps.description: Navigate to Trend Analyzer dashboard
Pin a trend to the watchlist
Set alert notifications for the pinned trend
Verify pinned trends appear in user watchlist
Verify notification settings are saved and alerts are sent on trend changes

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Enforcement
description: Verify that access to upload, job tracking, trend analysis, and export features is correctly restricted based on user role, and audit logs record all user actions.

steps.description: Login as a user with limited permissions
Verify restricted users cannot access catalogue upload or export
Login as admin user
Verify admin can access all features
Verify all user actions are recorded in audit logs

title: Malware Detection and Secure Upload Handling
description: Ensure system scans uploaded files for malware, rejects infected files, and handles secure uploads with private storage and signed URL delivery.

steps.description: Attempt to upload a file containing malware
Verify upload is blocked and user receives security warning
Upload clean valid file
Verify file stored in private storage with access via signed URLs

title: Responsive UI Navigation on Desktop and Mobile Devices
description: Verify that the global navigation renders as a persistent sidebar on desktop and as a bottom tab bar on mobile, providing quick access to key features.

steps.description: Access the platform on desktop viewport
Verify persistent sidebar navigation is visible with quick links
Access the platform on mobile viewport
Verify bottom tab bar navigation appears with quick access icons

title: API Rate Limiting and System Scalability Under Load
description: Test the backend API for rate limiting behavior and verify system stability and autoscaling of job workers when processing high volume batch catalogue generation jobs.

steps.description: Simulate high frequency API requests exceeding rate limits
Verify API rejects excessive requests with appropriate status and message
Submit multiple large batch catalogue generation jobs concurrently
Verify system autoscaling triggers and job queue latency remains within acceptable limits

title: Error Handling for Upload Failures and Duplicate Requests
description: Verify system handles upload failures gracefully with meaningful error messages and prevents processing duplicate catalogue generation requests for the same upload.

steps.description: Simulate upload failure due to network timeout
Verify user is notified with retry instructions
Submit the same catalogue generation request twice
Verify system detects duplicates and prevents redundant processing

title: Partner API Access and Signed URL Rotation
description: Verify that partners can programmatically retrieve catalogue assets via the API with proper authentication, and that signed URLs rotate periodically to maintain secure asset delivery.

steps.description: Authenticate using partner API credentials
Request catalogue assets via the API
Verify assets are delivered with valid signed URLs
Make repeated requests over time to verify signed URLs rotate as expected
